Label: CT 112: Roller-Coaster Interest Rate Swap starting at 01/0
Description: Roller-Coaster Interest Rate Swap starting at 01/02/2015 with a Notional of USD 1000.0 which first increses by USD 500.0 every half-year for 2 years and then decreases gradually until Maturity. The fixed leg is based on semi-annual payments at 1%, the floating leg is based on semi-annual payments at reference rate + 2%.
